resources.string:
"Tags make it easier to find your items again using search or filters from Saves.
To create a tag, enter one above."
"By proceeding, you agree to the: Pocket [Terms of Service](https://getpocket.com/tos) and [Privacy Notice](https://getpocket.com/privacy)"
Your offline cache cannot be found. Please make sure that your offline storage location properly connected. If you rearranged or modified the caches files, please restore them and try again.

"The storage location your offline cache is saved on is currently unavailable. This can happen if your device is connected to a computer via USB, if you removed the storage card, or if you revoked Pocket's Storage permission. Please undo this change and try again. Otherwise you can switch to a new cache in Pocket's Internal Storage."
Pocket had trouble loading this Collection. Please try again later.
"Cannot establish network connection. Please try again later."
"We have no updates. Please check again later."
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Are you sure you want to delete this item? This cannot be undone.
"If your device has limited memory, use Pocket's {name_of_storage_setting} Setting to limit how much space the cache can use."
There was a problem connecting to Pocket.
Your device does not have a Browser app available to open this webpage.
Could not register your device for instant push notifications at this time. Please try again later.
You must be connected to the internet when first enabling instant syncing
Setting up your device to receive push notifications…
Instant Sync is not supported by this device.
The changes to your tags have not yet been saved. Do you want to discard the changes or continue editing?
This will delete any files that have been saved for offline viewing.
This will clear your existing offline cache and start using the internal device storage instead.
You will be logged out and any files that have been saved on this device for offline viewing will be deleted.
There was a problem fetching your list from the server. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and try again.
You have been logged out from another location. Please log in again.
Sorry %1$s is not allowed as a tag.
For some unexpected reason, the Amazon Appstore app could not be opened. Sorry about that!
There was an error trying to connect, please make sure your device is connected to the internet and try again.
This device does not have any email apps installed.
If you want to try from another device, our email address is support@getpocket.com.

Pocket no longer has the Storage permission and cannot access the offline cache. To continue using an external storage location, please reenable the Storage permission for Pocket, or switch to Internal storage instead.
"We're sorry, but Pocket is having trouble accessing your SD card. We've logged this issue so our Android team can investigate. In the meantime, please continue to use Internal storage for Pocket."

"Pocket's offline storage location is out of space. Pocket requires additional free space to function. Please free some space up to continue. To clear up space, you may want to clear Pocket's offline cache."
Would you like to report this error?
Changing storage locations will clear your downloaded files.

That storage location is currently unavailable. Please make sure the storage card or device is connected properly. Also make sure it is not currently being used as external storage to a computer via USB.
Tags may only be 25 characters or less.

"When this app is installed on external storage (such as an SD Card), the time-based background sync options are not available.
You may use Instant or turn Background Syncing off."
Uh oh, something unexpected happened. Please try again, if you continue to have problems please let us know.
"Archive the saves you're finished with using the archive icon."
Keep your list fresh and clean
Hit the star icon to favorite an article and find it faster.
"Select a line in an article, then hit 'highlight' to save it for later."
Tag your saves by topic to find them later.
Your account has been migrated successfully.
You can retry loading Home again.
"You're all caught up! Check back tomorrow for more."
Sign in to get the best of Pocket
You can try loading articles again.
"You're currently limited to %1$d highlights per article. Get unlimited highlights (plus more) by upgrading to Pocket Premium today."
A calm, ad-free reading environment gives your mind the peace and quiet it deserves.
"You're officially a Pocket Premium member. Welcome to the new ad-free, customizable, permanent version of your Pocket. We think you'll like it here."
"We've renewed your subscription, and you're officially a Pocket Premium member again. We hope you enjoy this ad-free, customizable, permanent version of your Pocket."
"With unlimited highlighting in every article, you'll have a permanent record of all those \"Aha!\" moments."
"Even if a page you've saved is taken down online, you'll still have a copy of it in Pocket."
Like rounder fonts, wider spacing or condensed text? Tailor Pocket to suit your reading style.
"Quickly find anything you've saved with full-text search. Look up articles by keyword, topic, author, tag, and more."
"We'll suggest tags from your list each time you save a story—the more you tag, the more helpful the suggestions become."
Subscriptions will automatically renew each period until canceled in Google Play.
Pocket is upgrading your app. This may take a few minutes. The upgrade will continue in the background, so feel free to check back later.
There were no items that matched your search.
Listen will use cellular data if your device is not on Wi-Fi
There was an unexpected playback error
There was a problem playing this article. Try switching to a different voice.
Our server is taking too long to respond. Please try again later.
Try listening to them and the time will fly by.
"You're offline. Switch to an offline voice here."
Tap to try listening to this article on-the-go
Will use cellular data when not connected to Wi-Fi. Not available offline
Date does not match expected pattern: %1$s
Date out of expected year range %1$s - %2$s
Swipe to select a year, or tap to switch back to selecting a day
Scroll to show the next month
Scroll to show the previous month
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
Start date selection: %1$s – End date selection: %2$s
Tap to switch to Calendar view
Tap to switch to year view
"Looks like you're offline. Try checking your mobile data or wifi."
Can we notify you of great reads occasionally?
Social updates, recommendations, product news and other communication. Fine-tune your push notification preferences in Pocket Settings.
Control Offline Downloading, Listen (TTS) and other in-app features.
Collect articles, videos or any online content you like. Settle in with them anytime, on any phone, tablet or browser.
Save from Chrome, Twitter, YouTube or your favorite news app (for starters). Your articles and videos will be ready for you in Pocket.
Make the most of any moment
Pocket saves articles in a clean layout designed for reading—no interruptions, no popups—so you can sidestep the Internet’s noise.
Your quiet corner of the Internet
Pocket switched the preferred browser to %1$s, because default system browser is not configured.
"We can't find a browser to open this page"
Your subscription has ended. Tap to renew your Premium subscription.
Thanks for subscribing to Pocket Premium!
"Move quickly between articles with 'Next' and 'Previous' buttons"
The purchase was successful, but we had trouble activating your account. Please tap OK for instructions to complete activation.
You already have a subscription to Pocket Premium.
Upgrading to Pocket Premium is not currently available through the Amazon App Store.
Help upgrading to Pocket Premium on Amazon
You must be online to upgrade to Pocket Premium. Please check your connection and try again.
There was a problem when completing your purchase. Please try again.
We were unable to find a subscription. If you believe you have one, tap %s to let us know.
Make sure you are connected to the internet.
There was an error downloading the article view for this page.
The title, link, or image is broken
Your report helps keep the Pocket community safe.
Pocket will always open the original website instead of Article View
Hide toolbars while reading/scrolling down. Reveal toolbars while scrolling up
Approximately {item_count} of your {newest_or_oldest} items will be available offline.
Pocket may remove or download additional content to reflect your changes.
Currently applying your offline storage limits…
Pocket is using approximately {disk_space_size}" of your device's storage."
Set a limit on the amount of storage that Pocket is allowed to use for offline downloading.
This may take a few minutes to complete.
The changes have not yet been saved. Do you want to discard the changes or continue editing?
Display the last item I was in the middle of when I return to Pocket.
To delete your account, you must first cancel your Premium subscription here.
Your request could not be processed. Try again later.
You understand your Pocket account and data will be permanently deleted.
What could we have done better?
Automatically download the article for every item in your list
Unavailable when automatically downloading the best view
Customize notification sounds, vibration, and more in Android Settings
Flash LED when there is a new notification
When enabled, a lock button will appear in the center of the screen after rotating your device. Tap the icon to lock the current orientation, and tap again to unlock
When saving to Pocket from another app, briefly display actions you can take on the new item.
Displays text in Article View with justification
Start adding tags to your items in order to see them suggested here.
We were unable to find any tags to suggest for this item.
You must be online to see suggested tags. Please check your connection and tap here to try again.
"We're having trouble retrieving suggested tags. Please tap to try again."
"You've already saved this! We'll bump it to the top of your list."
There was a problem saving the link to Pocket
Log in to save to Pocket
"Article reported. Thanks for letting us know!"
There are no apps installed available for this action.
We had trouble reading this article with Text to Speech.
This article is not downloaded yet.
Choose a Text to Speech Engine
"This feature uses Android's built in Text to Speech (TTS) functionality. Your device does not have it installed yet."

"Pocket could not find your device's TTS Settings automatically.
You can try to find them manually by opening your device's settings and searching for them.
On most devices this can be found within your Accessibility settings or your Language and Input settings."
"We had trouble starting your selected Text to Speech engine. Please make sure it's installed in your device's Text to Speech settings."
Sorry but it appears that your device does not support Text To Speech (TTS).
"You can't listen until you've saved items to Pocket"
Just a heads up, network voices are higher quality, but may use network data or be unavailable while offline.
Text to Speech could not read this section. If you are using a network based voice, go online or choose a non-network voice. Otherwise, try skipping this passage.
"The best way to show your support is by telling others."
